TypeSignature.Value: public delegate void ADODC.ErrorDelegate(int errorNumber, ref string description, int scode, string source, string helpFile, int helpContext, ref bool cancelDisplay);
.class nested public auto ansi sealed ADODC/ErrorDelegate extends System.MulticastDelegate

Public Delegate Sub ADODC.ErrorDelegate(errorNumber As Integer, ByRef description As String, scode As Integer, source As String, helpFile As String, helpContext As Integer, ByRef cancelDisplay As Boolean)
public: delegate void ADODC::ErrorDelegate(int errorNumber, System::String ^ % description, int scode, System::String ^ source, System::String ^ helpFile, int helpContext, bool % cancelDisplay);

Attribute.AttributeName: System.Obsolete("Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.* classes are obsolete and supported within 32 bit processes only. http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=160862")

span.span: An that represents the error number.
A that contains the error message.
An that represents the error source.
A that represents the source name.

param.name: helpFile
param.span: 오류에 대한 도움말 파일을 나타내는 입니다.

span.span: A that represents the Help file for the error.

param.name: helpContext
param.span: 도움말 항목의 컨텍스트 ID를 나타내는 입니다.

span.span: An that represents the context ID for a Help topic.

param.name: cancelDisplay
param.span: 사용자가 오류 대화 상자를 취소할 수 있는지 여부를 결정하는 입니다.

span.span: A that determines whether the user can cancel the error dialog box.
Represents the method that will handle an event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!NOTE] > 함수 및 개체가 네임 스페이스는 Visual Basic 6.0에서 Visual Basic로 업그레이드 하기 위한 도구에서 사용 하기 위해 제공 됩니다.Functions and objects in the namespace are provided for use by the tools for upgrading from Visual Basic 6.0 to Visual Basic. 이러한 함수와 개체에서 제공하는 대부분의 기능은 [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)]의 다른 네임스페이스에서 얻을 수 있는 기능과 동일하므로In most cases, these functions and objects duplicate functionality that you can find in other namespaces in the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)]. 이러한 함수와 개체는 Visual Basic 6.0 코드 모델이 [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] 구현과 크게 다른 경우에만 사용해야 합니다.They are necessary only when the Visual Basic 6.0 code model differs significantly from the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] implementation.
